title: Manage Scaffolding Request
description: A crew needs scaffolding erected to access a work area at height.

tasks.description: Create a new scaffolding request, specifying the location and required dimensions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor logs a new request.

tasks.description: Submit the request to the on-site scaffolding contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The request is sent to the scaffolding team.

tasks.description: Once the scaffolding is built, inspect it and attach a 'safe to use' tag.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor inspects the scaffold, confirms it is safe, and logs the inspection in the system.
